wikipedia_page.main: William Mair (died 14 October 1897) was a politician in the British colony of South Australia.

link_mentions.page: Members of the South Australian House of Assembly, 1871–1875
response: : The Sturt MHA John Henry Barrow died on 22 August 1874. William Mair won the resulting by-election on 7 September.

link_mentions.page: List of South Australian House of Assembly by-elections

response: * William Mair (South Australian politician) (died 1897), member of the South Australian House of Assembly
